message: Just picked up another T-65 X-wing for my squad. Can't wait to test it!
Your rebellion will be crushed. Prepare for a swarm of TIE Interceptors.
Relax, Vader. Let’s see how that swarm does against a Ghost crew build 😏
Don’t forget—local tournament this Friday. Bring your A-game!
Soontir Fel doesn’t need luck. Just flawless maneuvering. See you Friday.
